alert.note: Alert for Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 12:33PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Oakland County through 100 PM EDT... At 1233 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Metamora to 6 miles west of Clarkston to near Brighton. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Oxford around 1240 PM EDT. South Lyon around 1245 PM EDT. Novi and West Bloomfield around 1250 PM EDT. Rochester around 1255 PM EDT. Southfield, Sterling Heights, Royal Oak, Birmingham and Detroit Zoo around 100 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Waterford, Orchard Lake, Holly State Recreation Area, Commerce, Rose Center, Lathrup Village, Auburn Hills and Bingham Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
